column24: The annual report has been presented in accordance with the Danish Financial Statements Act.
column25: We consider the accounting policies used appropriate, and in our opinion the annual accounts provide a true and fair view of the company's assets and liabilities and its financial position at 31 December 2018 and of the company's results of its activities in the financial year 1 January to 31 December 2018.
column30: Costs of sales includes costs for the purchase of raw materials and consumables less discounts and changes in inventories.
column31: Other external costs comprise costs for distribution, sales, advertisement, administration, premises, loss on debtors, and operational leasing costs.
